column3: Define a name for this config
You have two possibilities how to show the defined list: 1.) On top on the rest of list 'separated' with a line, 2.) Show only those hir defined ( 'exclusive' ).
Define the roles for which this config should be available, use 'user' to be available for all roles ( You should either define a username ( following attribute ) or user role ( this attribute ))
